tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE DriverBehaviorData (
    driver_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    speeding_score FLOAT,
    harsh_braking_score FLOAT,
    cornering_score FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE driver_behavior_data (
  driver_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  speed FLOAT,
  acceleration FLOAT,
  location VARCHAR,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE risk_factors (
  risk_factor_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  driver_id UUID,
  factor_name VARCHAR,
  factor_value FLOAT
  CONSTRAINT fk_driver_id FOREIGN KEY (driver_id) REFERENCES driver_behavior_data(driver_id)
);

CREATE TABLE trips (
 trip_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 driver_id INT,
 start_location VARCHAR(100),
 end_location VARCHAR(100),
 distance DECIMAL(10,2),
 trip_date DATE,
 FOREIGN KEY (driver_id) REFERENCES drivers(driver_id)
);

CREATE TABLE driving_logs (
 log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 driver_id INT,
 trip_id INT,
 log_time TIMESTAMP,
 speed INT,
 acceleration DECIMAL(5,2),
 FOREIGN KEY (driver_id) REFERENCES drivers(driver_id),
 FOREIGN KEY (trip_id) REFERENCES trips(trip_id)
);

CREATE TABLE drivers (
  driver_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  driver_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  license_number VARCHAR(20) UNIQUE,
  age INT
)

CREATE TABLE vehicles (
  vehicle_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  plate_number VARCHAR(15) NOT NULL,
  make VARCHAR(30),
  model VARCHAR(30),
  year INT
)

CREATE TABLE trips (
  trip_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  driver_id INT,
  vehicle_id INT,
  start_location VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  end_location VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  distance FLOAT,
  duration_minutes INT
)

CREATE TABLE incidents (
  incident_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  trip_id INT,
  incident_description TEXT,
  date_occurred DATE
)

CREATE TABLE driver_data (
	driver_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
	driver_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
	license_plate VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
	speed FLOAT NOT NULL,
	speed_limit FLOAT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE trip_data (
	trip_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
	driver_id UUID NOT NULL,
	start_location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
	end_location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
	start_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
	end_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE incident_data (
	incident_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
	trip_id UUID NOT NULL,
	location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
	incident_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
	severity INT NOT NULL
);
